data: Account of a Certain Extraordinary Affair

At the request of Mr. Andrew H. Barnes I make the following statement in order to explain how it came about that I entered into the arrangement for taking down from his dictation an Account of a Certain Extraordinary Affair.
The astounding crime on Torrington Road
